snippet: Tyler Herb pitched a two-hitter and Jacob May hit a three-run homer as Coastal Carolina knocked Manhattan (33-27) out of the Columbia Regional, 11-1.
abstract: Coastal Carolina knocks Manhattan out of the Columbia Regional, 11-1, in the NCAA Baseball Championships; other college baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Herb pitched a two-hitter and Jacob May hit a three-run homer as Coastal Carolina knocked Manhattan (33-27) out of the Columbia Regional, 11-1.

headline.seo: Manhattan Is Ousted From N.C.A.A. Baseball Tournament
headline.main: Manhattan Is Ousted From N.C.A.A. Tournament
